channel.title: Noctem - Server Managment Utility
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to my development of my Server management Utility called Noctem. Now when It's done, it will hopefully be the only utility you will need to edit your server. My goal is to first create a server base that will unify all of MoparScape, and this will be the only tool you need. It will allow you to edit almost every aspect of the server. The only restrictions will be the core classes. Right now, I just need some Ideas of some features to add. This is what I have right now:
[ul][li]Server Utilities [list] [li]None yet =\[/li] [/list] [/li]
[li]Editors [list] [li]Shop Editor [list] [li]Shop Name[/li] [li]Shop ID[/li] [li]Currency Type [list] [li]Gold[/li] [li]Tokkul[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Shop Items(JTable, 2 columns, Item ID on the left, amount in shop on the right)[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Character Editor [list] [li]Username[/li] [li]Password[/li] [li]Location(Needing to rethink this concept)[/li] [li]Status(Player, Mod, Admin, Owner)[/li] [li]is Member[/li] [li]Has Bank PIN[/li] [li]Bank PIN[/li] [li]Player Look(Appearance models and colors)[/li] [li]Equipment(Equipped Items, positions, and amounts)[/li] [li]Inventory[/li] [li]Bank[/li] [li]Ideas:Reorganize. Put bank information localized into bank tab, member into status maybe? Skills needed[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Npc Editor [list] [li]Npc ID[/li] [li]Npc Name[/li] [li]Npc Health[/li] [li]Npc Location[/li] [li]Npc Health[/li] [li]Npc Level[/li] [li]Npc Reapawn Time[/li] [li]Agressive[/li] [li]Attackable[/li] [li]Shop Owner[/li] [li]Protect From Mage[/li] [li]Protect From Melee[/li] [li]Protect From Range[/li] [li]Drops(JTable, Item ID/Amount/Percentage)[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Script Editor(Not currently being worked on)[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Logs [list] [li]Chat Logs(Not currently being worked on)[/li] [/list] [/li][/ul]
If you have more Ideas on organization or anything like that, feel free to post it.

item.title: Noctem - Server Managment Utility
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Hello, and welcome to my development of my Server management Utility called Noctem. Now when Itâ€™s done, it will hopefully be the only utility you will need to edit your server. My goal is to first create a server base that will unify all of MoparScape, and this will be the only tool you need. It will allow you to edit almost every aspect of the server. The only restrictions will be the core classes. Right now, I just need some Ideas of some features to add. This is what I have right now:

[ul][li]Server Utilities
[list]
[li]None yet =[/li]
[/list]
[/li]

[li]Editors
[list]

[/li]

[/li]

[/li][/ul]

If you have more Ideas on organization or anything like that, feel free to post it.
